name: Lich

skills.name: Curse of Blindness
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ACC] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Cocoon
skills.raw_description:
Places a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on this Champion for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 20% of their MAX HP.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Enervation
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Fully depletes the target's Turn Meter. Places a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
